product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Mini Ultra Facial Barrier-Hydrating Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGive BackKiehl's Ultra Facial Barrier Hydrating Cleanser is a cream-to-foam facial cleanser that removes makeup and sunscreen without stripping skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsA hydrating cream-to-foam cleanser for sensitive skin that lifts impurities without stripping the skin barrier.Research ResultsClinically tested to help remove makeup and sunscreen while immediately hydrating the skin.Formulated WithoutFormulated with no soap and no fragrance for all skin types including sensitive skin.Item 2638428How To UseLather formula with water to create creamy foam texture. Massage over face in circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and remove excess with a damp wash cloth or water. Gentle enough to use 2x a day.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Chloride, Glycol Distearate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Kaolin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Magnesium Gluconate, Squalane, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Panthenol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather formula with water to create creamy foam texture. Massage over face in circular motion. Rinse thoroughly and remove excess with a damp wash cloth or water. Gentle enough to use 2x a day.
